titles.title: Surplus Property for Veterans Act of 2012
To amend title 40, United States Code, to grant veterans access to Federal excess and surplus property.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 7/12/2012--Introduced. Surplus Property for Veterans Act of 2012 - Authorizes the transfer of federal surplus property to a state agency for distribution through donation within the state for purposes of education or public health for organizations whose membership comprises substantially veterans and whose representatives are recognized by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs (VA) in the preparation, presentation, and prosecution of claims under laws administered by the Secretary.
